summary.span: 用來表示工具、自訂建置規則、PropertyPage 等的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常表示 XAML 的磁碟上，只有一個執行個體，這個類別會維護每個個別專案引擎 （方案） 的 XAML 檔案。Typically represented on disk as XAML, only one instance of this class is maintained per XAML file per project engine (solution). 如果您以手動方式執行個體化這個類別，呼叫設定第一個物件的屬性之前和設定的最後一個屬性之後。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 類別清單，而這個 中的屬性屬於這個清單。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of categories that the properties in this belong to.
Returns the list of properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此為選擇性欄位。This field is optional. 欄位會傳回只的類別，已明確定義，而且不包含任何自動產生的類別。The field returns only the categories that were explicitly defined and that do not contain any auto-generated categories. 當包含在這宣告必須是項目不存在於此清單中，其類別目錄則已具有該名稱自動產生且加入內部分類清單。When a that is contained in this declares its category to be something that is not present in this list, then a that has that name is auto-generated and added to the internal list of categories. 此欄位不會傳回該自動產生的類別。That auto-generated category is not returned by this field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary GetPropertiesByCategory() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回分成不同類別之所有屬性的字典。

span.span: Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.

returns.span: 傳回字典，這個字典的索引鍵是 名稱，而值是該類別中的屬性清單。

span.span: Returns a dictionary whose keys are the names and whose values are the list of properties in that category.
The returned value is never .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的清單可能包含自動產生的類別。The returned list may contain auto-generated categories. 如果（或其衍生的類別） 的新類別會為它產生則是指未指定的屬性。If a (or its derived classes) refer to a property that is not specified, then an new Category is generated for it. 如果屬性不指定任何分類，則屬性會放在 [一般] 類別中。If no category is specified for the property, then the property is put in the "General" category. 類別目錄的清單就如同在 XAML 檔案中指定。The list of categories is exactly as specified in the XAML file. 自動產生的類別有指定的類別之後，但沒有嚴格的順序。The auto-generated categories come after the specified categories but in no strict order.
